job title: Safety Engineer ( Tourism City, Siem Reap )
position: Safety Engineer ( Tourism City, Siem Reap )
Job Description:
- Ensure a safe workplace environment without risk to health at construction site
- Strongly implement Health & Safety policies, procedures, rules and regulations at site
- Support in review of risk assessments for all work equipment and operations.
- Ensure that all accidents are documented, investigated and recommended improvements implemented.
- Carry out safety inspections, fire drills and fire alarms are correctly reported.
- Support in health & safety policies, systems of work and procedures.
- Provide regular reports to the HSE Manager, Project Manager, Construction Manager and Site Manager.
- Conduct toolbox meeting safety training to workers, technicians and staffs.
- Any other reasonable duties which may be required by management from time to time.
Job Requirement:
- Bachelor degree in Mechanical/Industrial Engineering.
- Fresh graduated of Mechanical Engineer/Industrial Engineering, for experience is advantages.
- Have knowledge of maintenance system for utilities
- Good computer literacy is essential (Word, Excel and PowerPoint).
- Good in English language speaking, writing and listening skills are mandatory required.
- Outstanding communication and presentation skills.

Company Profile:
Amret (https://www.amret.com.kh) is a leading microfinance institution established in 1991 that contributes to the economic and social development of Cambodia by providing a wide range of financial services to meet the needs of the large targeted customers. Amret has strong commitment and long-term business strategies to be a leading financial institution in the market by deploying ambitious digital strategies. 

Amret belongs to the Advans international group (www.advansgroup.com) a major shareholder and international shareholder (FMO and IFC). The Advans group serves over 750,000 clients, and has expanded its operations in nine countries such as Cambodia, Cameroon, Ivory Coast, Democratic Republic of Congo, Ghana, Myanmar, Nigeria, Pakistan, and Tunisia. 

Amret has more than 150 branches, located in 25 cities and provinces in Cambodia, and successfully serves 450,000 customers with around 4,000 highly dedicated employees.

job title: Senior Sales and Marketing Manager ប្រធានផ្នែកលក់ និងទីផ្សារជាន់ខ្ពស់
position: Senior Sales and Marketing Manager ប្រធានផ្នែកលក់ និងទីផ្សារជាន់ខ្ពស់
Job Description:
•	Contributes to marketing effectiveness by identifying short-term and long-range issues
•	Obtains market share by developing marketing plans and programs for each product; directing promotional support
•	Maintains relations with customers
•	Provides short- and long-term market forecasts and reports by directing market research collection, analysis, and interpretation of market data
•	Influences present and future products by determining and evaluating current and future market trends
•	Achieves financial objectives by preparing an annual budget; scheduling expenditures; analyzing variances; initiating corrective actions
•	Completes marketing department operational requirements
•	Develops marketing staff by providing information, educational opportunities, and experiential growth opportunities
•	Contributes to team effort by accomplishing related results as needed
•	Development and execution of PR plan(s) for corporate office and divisions
•	Regularly meet with and interview business division to stay up-to-date on their businesses and industries
•	Utilize Web sites and social media to post historical and current news-worthy items, press releases, speeches and awards
•	Assist in establishing business divisions and management as a source in the media Assist with the planning and execution of press conferences
•	Create process to streamline internal communications relating to the management of news-worthy events
•	Confirm article submissions relating to current events and issues in related industries
•	Produce News Clipping binders and organize Media Recaps for management review
•	Other task assign by Sale and Marketing Director.
Job Requirement:
•	Graduate BA or equivalent preferred with Sale and Marketing qualification
•	Minimum 4 years work experience in sale and marketing management
•	Proficiency in MS Office and accounting software
•	Good personality, honesty and professional  
•	Attention to Detail, Deadline-Oriented, and confidentiality.
•	Professional knowledge of sale and marketing
•	Be professional in communication skill
•	Fluent in English Communication is a must and Chinese is Plus Advantage
•	Ability to handle the guest complaint in very good manner and professionally
Company Profile:
Hong Lai Huat Group Limited (HLH Group) is a well-established and reputable real estate and property developer with 30 years of successful track record. Established since 1998, the Group has completed numerous projects in Singapore ranging from public and private resident developments, to commercial and industrial building. Some of its notable developments include D’Ecosia, D’s Fresco, D’s Castilia, D’Almira, D’ Lithium, D’Kranji Farm Resort and D’Centenial.

In 2008, the Group diversified into the agriculture sector in Cambodia and had since completed the development of a 10,000 hectares farmland that cultivates cassava, as well as invested in a cassava starch production factory.

The Group also expanded into property development in Cambodia with the development of its first freehold mixed-used project- D’ Seaview, in Sihanouk Ville. One of the largest mixed-use developments in Sihanouk Ville, D’Seaview comprises 737 residential units and 64 commercial units. HLH Group was listed on the Mainboard of the Singapore Exchange on 21st June 2000.

1- HLH Agriculture (Cambodia) Co., Ltd.
2- HLHI (Cambodia) Co., Ltd.
3- Royal Hong Lai Haut One Company Limited.
4- Jewel A Development Co., Ltd.
5- Agri-Oral Joint Cooperate Co., Ltd.
6- Public Housing Development (Cambodia) Co., Ltd.
7- PH One Development (Cambodia) Co., Ltd.

job title: Factory Manager ប្រធានគ្រប់គ្រងរោងចក្រ 1,800 - 2,500$
position: Factory Manager ប្រធានគ្រប់គ្រងរោងចក្រ 1,800 - 2,500$
Job Description:
1. Be responsible for all operation at the factory inclusive of production facilities and its output.
2. Prepare and control the planned factory budget accordingly to company rules and regulation
3. Oversee factory operation, inclusive house rules, security, production, and dormitory, up keeping of factory to preserve, observing and abiding factory safety rules and regulation and conduct drills and all activities related to safety periodically within the factory premises.
4. Manage all staffs in factory, work smoothly and to follow  up their scope of work
5. Cooperate with necessary all departments to ensure factory operation process smoothly
6. Plan and conduct regular and emergency meeting as deemed necessary
7. Identify priority activities, problems and solutions in coordination with the factory staffs
8. Monitor and keep track records material usage, stock inventory and fix assets
9. Daily and weekly reports factory progress to HQ
10. Perform any related works and duties as per required for the improvement of factory operation to achieved the goals and objective of the company
11. Manage and train all departments’ heads to achieve maximum efficiency of the operation.
12. To ensure fair work environment to all employees.
Job Requirement:
- At least Bachelor’s degree in related field such as Management, Sales & Marketing or Finance 
- Minimum 2 years working experience in the managerial levels in the mentioned area and or related
- Honest, highly responsible and reliable
- Good computer literacy (Internet and Email, Ms. Word, Excel)
- Ability to manage multi-tasks
- Proven management skills and ability to negotiate effectively with partners 
- Knowledge of data analysis and financial assessment 
- Proficient in English speaking, report writing and presentation
- Good integrity, positive attitude, helpful, high commitment, competence and motivation

job title: Farm Manager $1,400 - $2,000 ប្រធានគ្រប់គ្រងកសិកម្ម
position: Farm Manager $1,400 - $2,000 ប្រធានគ្រប់គ្រងកសិកម្ម
Job Description:
- Planning, management and profitability of the Operations Unit, accountabilities include winning and executing projects, staffing for operations department and other managerial functions
- Assists in the annual preparation of sales projections, expense budgets, and capital expenditure budgets
- Plans, organizes and directs all departments at the Operations unit level, responsible for achievement of overall company objectives
- Provides technical and administrative expertise and support for specific operations
- Liaison between the projects, other department and CEO 
- Ultimately responsible for managing operations people and resources, and the profit/loss performance of the Operations
- Develop and recommend annual operating and capital budget for the operations group, report on actual results against plan, implement and execute plans approved by CEO
- Develop and achieve positive operating statements and performance graphs having goals and targets, as per company objectives
- Direct all contracts with a hands-on approach to the day-to-day activities of the division
- Develop and implement strategic plans for contracts ensuring that all goals are either achieved or better with an emphasis upon service delivery
- Effectively manage all activities with regards to operations, construction, staff, quality, health and safety and business planning
- Hold regular review meetings with the staff in developing a proactive focus upon quality, overheads, manpower, programming, organization and delivery aspects
- Ensure a high level of teamwork and cohesion between all levels of staff
- Report on ongoing issues keeping them informed of any potential problems that could affect the business
- Manage day-today operation of the business ensure everything run smoothly
Job Requirement:
- At least Bachelor’s degree in related field such as Management, Sales & Marketing or Finance 
- Minimum 5 years working experience in the managerial levels in the mentioned area and or related
- Honest, highly responsible and reliable
- Good computer literacy (Internet and Email, Ms. Word, Excel)
- Ability to manage multi-tasks
- Proven management skills and ability to negotiate effectively with partners 
- Knowledge of data analysis and financial assessment 
- Proficient in English speaking, report writing and presentation
- Good integrity, positive attitude, helpful, high commitment, competence and motivation

job title: Farm Supervisor អ្នកគ្រប់គ្រងកសិកម្ម
position: Farm Supervisor អ្នកគ្រប់គ្រងកសិកម្ម
Job Description:
- Reporting to: Farm Manager 
- Location: Oral, Kompong Speu
- Salary Negotiate 

** Knowledge; Skill & Abilities:
- Good attitude and energy level
- Good communication
- Good in financial analyze 
- Good in budget planning
- Good in management skill
- Fluency English 
- Strategic thinking capability 
- Personal Effectiveness 
- Initiative and Leadership 
- Adding value through people development 

** Duties  & Responsibilities:
- Bachelor degree in agriculture or related field 
- Handle and manage cassava plantation at least 600 Hectares (in the block ………)
- Manage and make planting schedule with farm manager according to annual planting plan
- Prepare planting claim request with sub-contractor and submit to farm manager for approval 
- Oversee on plant status which under supervise from planting to harvesting
- Observe and take action on disease, insect, fertilizer, watering, weeding, spraying herbicide, pesticide and harvesting 
- Observe workers to detect inefficient and unsafe work procedures or to identify problem, initiating corrective action as necessary
- Prepare reports regarding farm condition, crop yields, diesel usage, machinery breakdown, or labor problem.
- Estimate labor requirements for jobs, and plan work schedules accordingly;
- Direct or assist with the adjustment and repair of farm equipment and machinery
- Assist in drive and operate farm machinery such as trucks, tractors, or self –propelled harvester in order to transport workers and supplies, or to cultivate and harvest fields
- Report to farm Manager of the cassava plantation regarding the farm progressing report
- Other duties assign by the farm Manager of the cassava plantation.
Job Requirement:
** Qualifications:
Exposure:
- Bachelor or diploma degree in agriculture or related field
- Have minimum 2 years working experiences in cassava farming or related field  
- Have a good communication with multiple cultures
- Able to communication in Khmer and English
- Able to work with local communities
- Good in written and speak in English (Speaking and reporting)
- Able to stay and work in the farm
- Initiative do a research for new agriculture technology for yield improvement
- Be honesty and working hard

Job Description:
• Operate tools in order to aid in the manufacturing process
• Report machine output, downtime and wastage

Company Profile:
Hong Lai Huat Group Limited (HLH Group) is a well-established and reputable real estate and property developer with 30 years of successful track record. Established since 1998, the Group has completed numerous projects in Singapore ranging from public and private resident developments, to commercial and industrial building. Some of its notable developments include D’Ecosia, D’s Fresco, D’s Castilia, D’Almira, D’ Lithium, D’Kranji Farm Resort and D’Centenial.

In 2008, the Group diversified into the agriculture sector in Cambodia and had since completed the development of a 10,000 hectares farmland that cultivates cassava, as well as invested in a cassava starch production factory.

The Group also expanded into property development in Cambodia with the development of its first freehold mixed-used project- D’ Seaview, in Sihanouk Ville. One of the largest mixed-use developments in Sihanouk Ville, D’Seaview comprises 737 residential units and 64 commercial units. HLH Group was listed on the Mainboard of the Singapore Exchange on 21st June 2000.

job title: Truck Operator Driver អ្នកបើកបរឡានត្រាក់ទ័រ​
position: Truck Operator Driver អ្នកបើកបរឡានត្រាក់ទ័រ​
Job Description:
•	បើកបរនៅកន្លែងការងារនៅការដ្ឋានខេត្តកំពង់ស្ពឺ
•	បំពេញភារកិច្ចប្រតិបត្តិការទៅនឹងស្តង់ដាររបស់ក្រុមហ៊ុន
•	អនុវត្តការងារយ៉ាងជិតស្និតជាមួយក្រុម និងប្រធានគ្រប់គ្រង
•	អនុវត្តកិច្ចការផ្សេងៗទៀតតាមការដឹកនាំរបស់ប្រធានគ្រប់គ្រង
•	សម្អាត និងថែទាំត្រាក់ទ័រ គ្រឿងចក្រ អោយមានសណ្តាប់ធ្នាប់ និងមានសុវត្ថិភាព
•	បំពេញភារកិច្ចប្រកបដោយសុវត្ថិភាព
Job Requirement:
•	ត្រូវមានបណ្ណបើកបរប្រភេទ (គ C) ត្រឹមត្រូវ
•	បទពិសោធន៏យ៉ាងហោចណាស់២ឆ្នាំក្នុងការបើកបរ
•	អាចអាន និង សរសេរ អក្សរខ្មែរបាន
•	ធ្វើការងារជាក្រុម
•	អាចបើកបរគ្រឿងចក្រផ្សេងៗទៀតបាន (មានអាទិភាព)
•	មានសមត្ថភាពរៀបចំការងារឱ្យកាន់តែមានផលិតភាពនិងទាន់ពេលវេលា
•	មានសមត្ថភាពក្នុងការលើកឡើងនិងដោះស្រាយបញ្ហា
•	បេក្ខជនអាចធ្វើការនិងស្នាក់នៅការដ្ឋានបាន (ខេត្តកំពង់ស្ពឺ)
•       ត្រូវចេះនិយាយភាសាអង់គ្លេស​​ 
• ​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​      មានសញ្ញាប័ត្របច្ចេកទេស

•	ប្រាក់ខែ: អាចចរចាបាន
•	ក្រុមហ៊ុនផ្តល់កន្លែងស្នាក់នៅ
•	កន្លែងធ្វើការ: ស្រុកឪរ៉ាល់ ខេត្តកំពង់ស្ពឺ
•	ម៉ោងធ្វើការៈ 7:00 ព្រឹក – 5:00 ល្ងាច (សម្រាកបាយ11:00ព្រឹក to 1:00រសៀល)

job title: Bulldozer Driver អ្នកបើកអាប៊ុល
position: Bulldozer Driver អ្នកបើកអាប៊ុល
Job Description:
- Operates tractor equipped with concave blade attached across front to gouge out, level, and distribute earth and to push trees and rocks from land preparatory to constructing roads and buildings or planting crops, or in mining, quarrying, and lumbering operations: Fastens attachments to tractor with clevis or wedge-pin hitches.
- Connects hydraulic hoses, belts, mechanical linkage, or power takeoff shaft to tractor to provide power to raise, lower, or tilt attachment.
- Moves levers to control tool bars, carriers, and disks.
- Moves levers and depresses pedals to maneuver tractor and raise, lower, and tilt attachment to clear right-of-way.
- Feels lever and listens for stalling action of engine to estimate depth of cut.
- Drives bulldozer in successive passes over terrain to raise or lower terrain to specified grade following markings on grade stakes or hand signals.
- Greases, oils, and performs minor repairs on tractor, using grease gun, oilcans, and handtools.
- When required to work to close tolerances, may be designated Fine-Grade-Bulldozer Operator.
- When operating bulldozer to loosen soil, may be designated Scarifier Operator.
- May be designated according to type of tractor operated as Crawler-Tractor Operator; Forest Fire Equipment Operator; or attachment added as Angledozer Operator.
- May operate bulldozer to scrape surface clay to determine existence and types of clay deposits or to gather clay into piles preparatory to removal to brick-and-tile manufacturing plant and be designated Scraper Operator.
Job Requirement:
- Be able to work at province
- Experience at least 5 years in Mechanical or related field
- Knowledge of mechanical skill with all machinery.
- Having a technical or technological aptitude.
- Hard working and conscientious
- Good command of spoken and written English
- Hard-working, self-motivated, smart and fast learner

job title: Store Manager/ Assistant Store Manager (Very Urgent)
position: Store Manager/ Assistant Store Manager (Very Urgent)
Job Description:
1. Working with the store:
- Responsible for all the operations in-store and weekly or monthly inventory counts.
- Record and inspect all input, output and storage operations.
- Weekly, monthly and annual inventory reports of high sales and low or no sales meet. 
- Manage the cleaner to clean the shop, hygienic and safety. 
- Request purchase order for goods, goods for sale and in-store supplies.
- Inspect damaged goods, overdue for use and make a request to deduct damaged goods.
- Develop a sales strategy to drive sales growth and manage costs, control cash and manage cash for store.

2. Work with staff: 
- Manage all employees in the store with a good manner and instruct new employees about their works.
- Prepare weekly roster at the end of each month and send to HR on the 25th for review and approval.
- Record daily attendance, shifts, working hours and note employees who come late or leave illegally.
- If employee request leave, must complete application for the leave in accordance with company policies.
- Organize staff according to their roles, responsibilities and provide proper training in accordance with the principles.
- Encourage employees and collect feedback from staff in the store to correct any points that are not good.
- Educate, guide and give immediate advice to any staff member who has a shortcoming.

3. Working with clients: 
- Understand customer needs, wants, give ideas that can make the store grow.
- Solve problems that occur between customers and staff, customers with the store.
- Provide customer service with a smile, clarity and promptness.

4. Other work: 
- Manage and resolve other related issues in the store.
- Develop strategies to increase or expand customers.
- Perform other duties as assigned by the General Manager, CEO, or other relevant section manager.
Job Requirement:
- Bachelor's degree or higher in Business Administration, Management or related field.
- At least 1-2 years’ experience as an assistant store manager, store manager, market ... or in the field related to wine and beverage products ...
- Good communication skills with customers and product introduction.
- Good Communication in English both speaking and writing. 
- Be proactive and work oriented to employees well.
- Always have a positive attitude in all situations where there is a problem or an issue that arises responsibly.
- Computer literate Microsoft Office Word, Excel, Email, Internet.
- Overall, what the store needs from the staff is the ability to work honestly (for the company, the customers themselves and the team) and a dedicated staff

Company Profile:
Prudential (Cambodia) Life Assurance PLC began operations in Cambodia in January 2013. It is the leading life insurer in Cambodia with more than USD280 million assured and 27,000 policies issued (as at 31 September 2015). One of the first life insurers in Cambodia, Prudential Cambodia is committed to raising the awareness of life insurance among the Cambodian people and helping them protect and secure their financial futures.

Prudential Cambodia is part of UK-based Prudential plc. Founded in 1848, Prudential plc is an international financial services group with significant operations in Asia, the US and the UK. It serves around 25 million insurance customers and have £505 billion of assets under management (as at 30 June 2015). Prudential plc is listed on the stock exchanges in London, Hong Kong, Singapore and New York.

Prudential plc is not affiliated in any manner with Prudential Financial, Inc., a company whose principal place of business is in the United States of America.

Job Description:
1.	Ensure that the Purchasing Department records and checks all purchase so that the best quality and the best available price are obtained. 
2.	Inspect the receiving area periodically to verify that receiving procedures are being followed. 
3.	Inspect all store rooms at least once daily and personally check the items contained in the store room against bin cards, meat tags, etc. to ensure that store room procedures are being observed. 
4.	Prepare the daily Food and beverage sales and cost (daily flash cost) reports. 
5.	Ensure staff are accurately performing assigned work and that items for expense charges and correctly posted.
6.	Work with the Executive Chef to ensure that items listed on the menus are ordered and that supplies received are of the highest quality. 
7.	Update the menu-costing quarterly and report the result to the Food and Beverage manager with proposed sales prices and percentage cost of each dish. 
8.	Conduct food testing with the chef of new products available in the market. 
9.	Prepare food analysis when new menu items are added or when requested by the F&B/Kitchen Department.
10.	Conduct spot-checks on potion so that consistent portion sized are maintained. 
11.	Work with F&B Cashier Supervisor to ensure that all food/beverage taken out of kitchen/bars are supported by a captain’s order and that guest checks have correct prices.
12.	Take monthly inventories of food/beverage, general store room, and bars. 
13.	Finalize the month-end cost board by the 3-rd working day of the following month. 
14.	Complete the month-end report by the 6th working day of the following month. 
15.	Prepare a report on the comparison of the hotel’s prices with the leading competing hotels in the area, and submit to Management each month.
16.	Conduct market surveys twice a month and report the results to the Accounting Division Manager.
17.	Spot check the house-use/entertainment checks and reports to the Accounting Division Manager every month-end.
18.	Maintain the highest standards of discretion, honesty, business ethics and devotion to duty. 
19.	Complete other duties that are assigned by the Finance team/GM.
Job Requirement:
•At least BA degree in Accountant and related with basic accounting is better. 
•Both is preferred, Age between 25-35
•Minimum 1 years’ experience in above field or in similar position.
•Written and spoken proficiency in Khmer and English or Chinese will be advantaged.
•Able to work under pressure and work as a team.
•Computer literate - Microsoft word, Excel and Power point.
•Self-motivated to achieve high quality standard of food and beverage management.
•Strong interpersonal and high standard of customer service.
•Have good references as a leader that confident in leadership qualities
•Knowledge of the restaurant's facilities, layout and service standard.



*Staff Benefits:
•Working Hours 8 h /per day and 6 Days/ Weeks
•Salary Range 300$-450$
•Meal Allowance for Lunch 2.5$/ Per daay
•Holidays is followed labor law and company
•Public Holiday with 
•And have other benefits that staffs have good performance

Job Description:
** Location: Phnom Penh (Choam Chao)
** Need: Female (only)

** Job description:
- Customer service is responsible for indoor service operation in showroom
- Administer service activities by processing the relevant documents for customers
- Record customers booking and manage schedule service maintenance
- Aim to achieve monthly or annual targets
- Maintain and develop relationships with customer
- Introduce and assist customer for products available
- Handles customer concerns and information
- Conduct follow-up to verify customer satisfaction on new vehicle sales, warranty, service and concerns resolutions
- Monitors customer memorandum to ensure parts ordering and parts arrival
- Communicate concerns to the appropriate department and ensure resolution to the customer’s satisfaction
- Contact customers to market products and promotions
- Proactively contact customers following vehicle purchase, to schedule first maintenance
- Backup call after service maintenance or repair finish.
- Be-able to explain customers by phone call.
- Daily check workshop activity and plans for next day
- Daily report to GM and Service manager
- Other duties as assigned by management
Job Requirement:
- Graduated of Marketing, Sale, Business or any related course.
- At least 1-2 years working experience in admin customers service or car dealership
- Good at Microsoft skill (word, excel, ppt)
- Able to communicate in English and Chinese Speaking
- Able to work out side for field research or another task assigned by manager
- Good communicator, and flexible
- Honestly, Hardworking, work under pressure
- Knowledge of business development

Job Description:
1.	ជំហានដំបូងមុនទៅទិញបន្លែត្រូវពិនិត្យមើលការបញ្ជាទិញ(បុង)ជាមុនសិន ហើយត្រូវមើលឲ្យយល់មុននឹងទៅទិញ បើឆ្ងល់ត្រង់ណាអាចសួរបាន ជៀសវាងកុំឲ្យទិញខុស
2.	ត្រូវមានចំណេះដឹង និង ជំនាញតថ្លៃទំនិញគ្រប់មុខនៅតាមទីផ្សារ/ផ្សារ
3.	ត្រូវចេះប្រៀបធៀបមើលគុណភាព និងតម្លៃទំនិញពីអ្នកបោះដុំ/ លក់រាយគ្រប់ប្រភេទនៅតាមទីផ្សារ/ផ្សារ 
4.	ត្រូវទិញបន្លែ សាច់ គ្រឿងទេស ក្នុងបុងណាដែលត្រូវដឹកចេញទៅមុនគេជៀសវាងកុំឲ្យយឺតយ៉ាវ
5.	ក្នុងករណីបន្លែឡើងថ្លៃត្រូវរាយការណ៏មកកាន់ការិយាល័យដើម្បីកែតម្លៃក្នុងអ៊េប ( App ) និង តម្លៃទៅភ្ញៀវ
6.	ត្រូវចេះវេចខ្ចប់/ ច្រកថង់រាល់ទំនិញគ្រប់មុខអោយមានសុវត្ថិភាព និងងាយស្រួលដឹកជញ្ជូន
7.	ពេលទិញបន្លែហើយត្រូវយកតម្លៃបន្លែទាំងអស់ដែលបានទិញរួចប្រគល់ឲ្យអ្នកវាយបុងភ្លាមដើម្បីវាយបុងហើយរៀប
ឥវ៉ាន់ចេញដឹកឲ្យភ្ញៀវអោយបានទាន់ពេលវេលា
8.	ពេលទិញបន្លែរួចរាល់អស់ក្នុងមួយថ្ងៃត្រូវសរសេរបុង ដើម្បីទូទាត់កាចំណាយការទិញបន្លែក្នុងមួយថ្ងៃ
9.	ត្រូវមានភាពស្មោះត្រង់ជាមួយនិងក្រុមហ៊ុន និងមានទំនាក់ទំនងល្អជាមួយក្រុមការងារ
10.	អាចធ្វើការផ្លាស់ប្តូរវេនគ្នានៅចុងសប្តាហ៍និងនៅថ្ងៃសម្រាកបុណ្យទានផ្សេងៗតាមការពិភាក្សាក្រុម
11.	ការងារផ្សេងៗនឹងត្រូវចាត់ចែងដោយថ្នាក់ដឹកនាំ ក្នុងករណីចាំបាច់
Job Requirement:
១. កម្រិតវប្បធម៌ចាប់ពីថ្នាក់ទី៩ ឡើងទៅ១២
២. ទាំងពីរភេទ និង អាយុចាប់ពី ២៥ឆ្នាំឡើងទៅ
៣. មានបទពិសោធការងារចាប់ពីរ១ឆ្នាំឡើងទៅ រឺ មិនមានក៏ចរចារបាន
៤. អាចសរសេរភាសារខ្មែរបាន និង អង់គ្លេសបាន រិតតែល្អប្រសើរ
Staff Benefits:
១. ប្រាក់ខែចាប់ពី 250$ - 350$
២. ថ្លៃអាហារ១ថ្ងៃ 2.50$ 
៣. ម៉ោងធ្វើការ៨ម៉ោងក្នុង១ថ្ងៃ
៣. ១សប្តាហ៍ធ្វើការ៦ថ្ងៃ (Dayoff 1ថ្ងៃ)
៤. ឈប់សម្រាកពិធីបុណ្យធំៗ
៥. ទទួលបានអត្ថប្រយោជន៍ផ្សេងៗទៀត

Job Description:
១. មានការទទួលខុសត្រូវ ស្មោះត្រង់ និងបែងចែកការបញ្ជាទិញអោយមានភាពរលូន និងមានប្រសិទ្ធិភាពខ្ពស់ ។
២. សម្របសម្រួល ត្រួតពិនិត្យនិងវាយតម្លៃរាល់សកម្មភាពបញ្ជាទិញរបស់បុគ្គលិកថ្នាក់ក្រោម
៣. អនុវត្ត ត្រួតពិនិត្យ និងវាយតម្លៃរាល់សកម្មភាពទិញដើម្បីធានានូវសកម្មភាពផលិតកម្មប្រកប ដោយសុវត្ថិភាពនិងរលូន។ 
៤. បង្កើតនិងរក្សាស្តង់ដារខ្ពស់នៃការទំនាក់ទំនងជាមួយអ្នកផ្គត់ផ្គង់សម្រាប់សេវាកម្មដែលមាន  ប្រសិទ្ធិភាពថ្លៃដើមនិងពេញចិត្តបំផុត។ 
៥.ធ្វើកំណែទម្រង់និងត្រួតពិនិត្យការវាយតម្លៃរាល់សកម្មភាពទិញដើម្បីធានានូវសកម្មភាព ផលិតកម្មប្រកបដោយសុវត្ថិភាពនិងរលូន។ ។ 
៦. អនុវត្តរាល់បញ្ហាបញ្ជាទិញដោយធ្វើអន្តរកម្មជាមួយភាគីពាក់ព័ន្ធ។
៧. អភិវឌ្ឍនិងថែរក្សាទំនាក់ទំនងប្រកបដោយប្រសិទ្ធិភាពជាមួយក្រុមការងារ អ្នកផ្តល់ទំនិញ  អ្នកកាម៉ង់ទំនិញ និង ផ្នែកពាក់ព័ន្ធ ។
៨. បង្កើតនិងអនុវត្តសកម្មភាពអប់រំនិងបណ្តុះបណ្តាលដល់បុគ្គលិកថ្នាក់ក្រោមផ្នែក ដើម្បីបង្កើនចំណេះដឹងនិងជំនាញទាក់ទងនឹងការបញ្ជាទិញ។
៩. ត្រូវធានាថាការចំនាយថវិកា និង ទទួលថវិកា ប្រកបដោយតម្លាភាព ស្មោះត្រង់ ប្រសិទ្ធិភាព  និង ប្រសិទ្ធិផល សម្រាប់ក្រុមហ៊ុនចុច១ ។
១០. ការងារទំនាក់ទំនងផ្សេងៗទៀត ត្រូវបានកំណត់ ដោយប្រធានគ្រប់គ្រងប្រតិបត្តិចុច១
១១. ត្រូវធ្វើរបាយការណ៍លម្អិតជូនទៅប្រធានគ្រប់គ្រងចុច១ និង ក្រុមហ៊ុន
១២. បង្ហាត់បង្ហាញដល់បុគ្គលិកថ្នាក់ក្រោមស្តីពីការត្រួតពិនិត្យគុណភាពទំនិញ ការចរចារតម្លៃ  និងការវេចខ្ចប់ដោយសុវត្ថិភាព
១៣. ដឹកនាំក្រុមការងារអ្នកបញ្ជាទិញថ្នាក់ក្រោម សិក្សាស្វែងយល់អំពីប្រភេទសាច់ ផ្នែកនៃសាច់ និងបន្លែ ព្រមទាំងគ្រឿងទេសផ្សេងៗ (ទាំងផលិតផលក្នុងស្រុក និង នាំចូល)

job title: Accountant and Admin Officer USD 200.00 – USD 300.00
position: Accountant and Admin Officer USD 200.00 – USD 300.00
Job Description:
• Assist branch manager in preparing monthly budget plan 
• Check and reviewing monthly purchase request from another department. 
• Review all supporting documents and prepare payment voucher for cash expense before submit to BM for approval. 
• Preparing payment to supplier.
• Recording all daily expenditure for branch.
• Monitoring monthly budget spending.
• Make cash withdrawal from bank for petty cash. 
• Check and control fix assets for branch.
• Update fix asset list every quarterly. 
• Assist OP department in purchasing material
• Prepare contract for big supplier.
• Do bank reconciliation
• Prepare monthly expense report for branch.
• Prepare monthly Tax on Expense report to Branch Account controller.
• Prepare cash count report at end of the month.
• Prepare branch financial report. 
Collection
• Creating new customer contract, new sale invoice for new customer. 
• Encode customer payment in to NAV.
• Recording daily collection report. 
• Updating customer information and fee as requesting from CS department.
• Reviewing invoice cancel and delete that request from CS department before
• Submit to BM for approval. 
• Spot check by phone call to customers in order to clarify information before doing cancel and delete.
• Reports (Monthly cash collection, case disbursement, bank reconciliation)
• Filling (Do filling all finance reports filled at headquarter, SRP)


HR & Administration
• Recording all staff attendance, Leave and make sure attendant are clarification with Supervisor and, or Leader when required.
• New staff introductions and Conduct orientation on company policies and procedure, canteen, accommodation and company do and don’t to all new workers.
• Update staff information and make sure the company receives the correct documents and keep filling well for soft and hard copy. (register new staff and staff resignation).
• Understand well about NSSF (NSSF Card, NSSF Payment, Accident and health care Service). 
• Submit all payroll support documents to HR department at SRP (Weekly and Monthly).
• Responsible and control the uniform stock and issue to staff/workers with monthly report.
• Filling (Maintain staff filling, Letter in & out filling, and keep filling admin part)
• Other task may assign by manager.
Job Requirement:
• Bachelor Degree in Accounting, Finance and Banking, Business and Management, or a related area
• 2 or 3 years of experience in related work. 
• Experience with ERP software (Microsoft Dynamic NAV 2016) is preference. 
• Knowledge of Microsoft Office (Word, Excel, PowerPoint…) with massive data. 
• Highly responsible for work completion with accuracy and within deadline
• Good interpersonal Communication and problem-solving skill
• Confident and self-motivated
• Able to write, read and speak in English.
• Work independence and self-management. 
• Excellent teamwork and team building skills
• Strong desire to learn and commit to his/her further development.
• Ability to work under pressure and be flexible.

Company Profile: Urban Hub Cambodia is a multi-award-winner and one of Cambodia’s biggest fully licensed real estate developers. We are committed to developing projects that provide the new generations of Cambodia with exceptional modern living and experience of the first world that focuses on “LIVE, WORK, PLAY” yet preserving the Cambodian tradition and identity of community living.Registered in 2017, Urban Hub Cambodia is a joint venture between a Hong Kong-based conglomerate, Goldfame Group, the largest Hong Kong investor in Cambodia since 1992, and a Cambodian-American real estate company, Urban Living Solutions. Urban Hub Cambodia has quickly become a leading mixed-use property developer and the first developer ever from Cambodia to win the most awards including two major regional awards, “Best Condo Development in Asia 2019” and “Best Co-working Space in Asia 2020” at Asia’s longest-running and most respected property awards organized by PropertyGuru. Urban Hub Cambodia is behind the four most award-winning Cambodian projects both locally and regionally, including Urban Loft, Factory Phnom Penh, Urban Village Phase 1, and Urban Village Phase 2. More projects are expected in the near future.

Company Profile:
Wing Bank (Cambodia) Plc – the bank for every Cambodian – is driven by the vision to provide every Cambodian with convenient access to financial services relevant to, and for the improvement of their daily lives.

Wing Bank has revolutionized the way Cambodians access financial services by introducing instant, secure, and convenient Mobile Financial Services since 18 August 2008.

Today, Wing Bank serves the entire Cambodian population with 100% coverage of the districts in Cambodia thanks to the innovative Wing Bank App, over 10,000 Wing Cash Xpress agents, over 55,000 merchants, and partnerships with industry giants such as Mastercard, MoneyGram, AliPay, WeChat Pay, Western Union, Visa, and Ria.

Wing Bank provides an array of advanced financial products both for individual and corporate customers. These include loans, deposits, micro savings, credit referral services, money transfers, utility and insurance payments, supply chain payments, payroll services and even phone top-ups. In addition, Wing offers retail payments via “WingPay”, and has also introduced the “WingMall” e-commerce platform.

Both small and large companies alike are now using Wing’s payroll and disbursement services, speeding up their payments. Over 80% of Wing’s agents and 50% of customers are women, making Wing a shining example of gender inclusion in the region.

Wing Bank is committed to providing financial, gender and digital inclusion to the unbanked and the under-banked, allowing every Cambodian to enjoy convenience and security when it comes to financial services
Contact Info: Contact Information HR Department   078 988 290 / 078 989 509 / 078 989 114 jobs@wingbank.com.kh No. 721, Preah Monivong Blvd., Sangkat Beung Keng Kang 3, Khan Chamkar Mon, Phnom Penh, Cambodia 078 988 290 / 078 989 509 / 078 989 114

Company Profile:
From a very humble beginning as a small roofing sheet roll former in 1997, ISI STEEL, A member of ISI GROUP, has successfully transformed itself from a family-run business into a midsize corporation leading Cambodia's steel processing industry. With modern processing facilities, world-class management systems and technology, dedicated staff and nationwide distribution networks serving our customers nationwide, ISI STEEL has become a truly reliable and respectable local brand synonymous with quality roofing and wall cladding systems and structural steel products.

This would not have been possible without the strong support of our customers, local and international business partners, our staff's dedication and hard work, and last but not least the government efforts for maintaining the political stability and sustainable economic growth. To ensure our company’s sustainable development and industry-leading position, we are committed to further invest in upgrading our manufacturing facilities, expanding our distribution network, building up our human capital, technology infrastructure, and product innovations to better meet our customer's need and expectation.

While continuing to strengthen our core capabilities in the manufacturing and distribution of quality coated steel products, we have over the years ventured into a number of related diversifications such as pre-engineering steel building fabrication, property development including industrial park, residential, offices and resorts developments, and other construction materials trading business through our subsidiary and affiliated companies to capture the opportunities in the growing economy of Cambodia.

Job Description:
Service Executions:
- Manage the ware house for working safety with proper organize and control parts inventory
- Maintain availability stock part for both maintenance and general repair to meet the model range of vehicles service.
- Keep best balance to achieve the inventory of delivery timely
- Keep the stock level appropriate for demand
- Select the items to stock and monitor stock turn
- Calculate the stock volume appropriate for demand
- Analyze and adjust the stock volume according to needs
- Calculate daily order volume appropriate for demand
- Negotiate purchasing terms with suppliers to minimize costs and improve profitability
- Monitor part counter person for parts wholesales, and Accessories sales
- Develop promotional campaigns for parts aging sales
- Build good relationship with customers and build a good team work
- Monitor stock count and schedule for completion
- Monitor stock receive and posting into system timely
- Check and report Month of Stock and stock movement by giving suggestion for stock refill
- Prepare purchase order and payment request for stock part ordering
- Monitor stock in and stock out after posting and report
- Verify stock turn and re-turn and stock fill rate
- Make monthly stock report and send to management

Department activities:
- Coordinates service effort with logistics / after sales service / and management
- Keep abreast of product applications / technical services / market conditions / competitive activities / advertising and promotional trends through the reading of pertinent literature and consulting with marketing and after sales service
- Supplies management with oral and written reports on customer needs / problems / interests / competitive activities / and potential for new products and services
Job Requirement:
- Bachelor Degree in any relevant fields.
- At least 3 years experienced in stock/warehouse control.
- Used to work in automotive industry is a plus+
- Team player, leading skill
- Able to communicate in English
- Humble, loyal and good team work
- Expats are encourage to apply

*Other:
- Benefit: competitive salary
- Insurance
- Working hour (8:00am-5:30pm)
- Working day (Five and half day Per week)
- Public Holiday

Email: hr@hgbauto.com

Job Description:
•Job Summary:

This role is acting as People Advisor, Compensation and Benefit specialist who is responsible for leading and driving the Employee services, HR Operations including system, processes and compliances as well administering employee compensations and benefits. 

•Job Description:

-Be the subject matter expert in HR system.
-Educate employees and line managers about on relevant processes and systems.
-Manage employee onboarding, offboarding as well as other HR related processes and work with relevant stakeholders to ensure positive experiences of the employees.
-Identify ways to improve HR processes to create employee experiences.
-Manage employee’s queries and case management following the agreed service level agreement (SLA)
-Ensure employees data accuracy through conducting regular sample checks.
-Ensure labor and operational compliances are fulfilled including staff in out declaration, work permit arrangement and other operational & compliance requirements.
-Ensure HR processes and standards are in place following the AIA’s standard practices.
-Administer payroll and relevant employee’s compensation administration process end to end (starting from data collection, calculation to payment) 
-Work with relevant stakeholder to ensure payment is done on time with no errors.
-Work with relevant team to provide monthly accrual to Finance department
-Perform tax filing and work with Tax preparer to ensure tax preparation is completed on time.
-Provide reports and analysis to AIA Group, Regulators and as requested by managements. 
-Ensure risk and compliances are fulfilled with no errors.
-Ensure efficiency and effectiveness of the work by having frequent review on the processes and practices through collective feedback from employees and stakeholders.
-Performs other responsibilities and duties periodically assigned by supervisor in order to meet operational and / or other requirements
Job Requirement:
•Qualification & requirement:
-University Degree in Human Resources Management or equivalent. 
-At least 2-3 years working experiences in HR Operations, Payroll and related fields
-Proactive and a problem solver in a fast-moving industry
-Detail minded, efficient, responsible, self-motivated and able to work under pressure 
-A good team player who is keen to learn 
-Highly driven and results-focused in a fast-paced environment 
-Proficient command of spoken and written English
-Good inter-personal skill

•Working Days and Hours:
- Monday to Friday: 8:00am to 12:00pm & 1:00pm to 5:00pm
- Lunch time: 12:00pm to 1:00pm
Company Profile: AIA Cambodia is guided by our Purpose to help Cambodians live Healthier, Longer, Better lives. Since commencing business in 2017, we’ve become the first life insurer to provide coverage on 26 critical illnesses. As among the Kingdom’s leading insurers, AIA Cambodia today offers market-leading life solutions for all walks of life ranging from tailor-made crucial coverage plans that include critical illnesses, accidents, hospital allowances and overseas emergency assistance.AIA Cambodia has strived to make a significant, positive impact for our customers and communities. As we look to the future, this commitment is reinforced by our Purpose: to help millions of people live Healthier, Longer, Better Lives. Our Purpose guides the decisions we make and the actions we take as an organization — empowering and enabling people to understand and manage their health, while meeting their long-term savings and protection needs. Helping create a healthier Asia is one of the most important and valuable things we can do for our communities, today and tomorrow.AIA Cambodia is the only Cambodian life insurer awarded HR Asia’s “Best Companies to Work for in Asia” for three consecutive years, in 2020, 2021 and 2022. Headquartered in Phnom Penh, the company currently has branches in Siem Reap, Kampot, Kampong Cham and Battambang.
Contact Info: Contact Information HR Department   070 949 111 kh.careers@aia.com  12th Floor, Exchange Square, Street 106-61  ,Sangkat Wat Phnom, Khan Daun Penh, Phnom Penh, Cambodia 070 949 111

Job Description:
Accountability
•	Roll out digital platforms to transform the client & advisor journeys. 
•	Act as a business advisor to the technical team for the platform creation.
•	Work with the business product managers to lead the conceptualization of the platform’s design and architecture for platforms. Over time, can co-create platforms for business.
•	Assess potential markets and bringing innovations to that market as per the actual business needs.
•	Own the end-to-end customer experience for our products. In this role, you will have the freedom to run with digital application ideas and to create cutting edge and innovative products that meets the needs of our customers.
•	Maintaining platform analytics and enabling business acceptance testing
•	Take part in regional and global meetings and act as a meaningful contributor, promoting the innovation agenda
•	Enable use of available technology by promoting digital adoption within and outside the organisation
•	Oversee and facilitate the evaluation and selection of functionality, technology and application.
Job Requirement:
Competencies
•	Ability to suggest solutions to the traditional back office processes as per the new digital needs.
•	Attention to details.
•	Innovative thinking that can break down barriers and provide unique solutions.
•	Expert written and verbal communications skills. Draws conclusions and effectively communicates findings with both technical and non-technical team members, providing active leadership skills across project team and business community.
•	Strong analytical and conceptual skills; ability to create original concepts and theories for a variety of projects.
•	Trust - Ability to work in an open culture with a positive approach.
•	Flexibility – Ability to accept change and agility.
•	Exceptional interpersonal skills in areas such as teamwork, facilitation and negotiations.
•	Ability to understand the long-term ("big picture") and short-term perspectives of situations.
Company Profile:
Prudential (Cambodia) Life Assurance PLC began operations in Cambodia in January 2013. It is the leading life insurer in Cambodia with more than USD280 million assured and 27,000 policies issued (as at 31 September 2015). One of the first life insurers in Cambodia, Prudential Cambodia is committed to raising the awareness of life insurance among the Cambodian people and helping them protect and secure their financial futures.

Prudential Cambodia is part of UK-based Prudential plc. Founded in 1848, Prudential plc is an international financial services group with significant operations in Asia, the US and the UK. It serves around 25 million insurance customers and have £505 billion of assets under management (as at 30 June 2015). Prudential plc is listed on the stock exchanges in London, Hong Kong, Singapore and New York.

Prudential plc is not affiliated in any manner with Prudential Financial, Inc., a company whose principal place of business is in the United States of America.
Contact Info: Contact Information PCLA Recruitment HR Manager 087333908 pclarecruitment@prudential.com.kh Phnom Penh Tower, 20F, #445 Monivong Blvd, Boeung Prolit, 7 Makara, Phnom Penh 087333908

Job Description:
RESPONSIBILITIES
1. Partners with Business Development to set and lead regional marketing priorities.

4. Broad functional experience in areas of strategic planning and marketing, business and market development, market research and planning and promotions/advertising.
5. Experience building strategic marketing programs/concepts, and selling the strategic programs at the Executive level.
6. Experience creating and implementing brand awareness and communications programs and driving business using direct and channel-oriented selling models.

Job Description:

• Other Ad-Hoc duties and tasks assigned by the Management of the company
Job Requirement:
• Female and Male, Age from 20 to 30.
• Bachelor’s degree in human resources or related fields.
• At least 3 years’ experience, preferably in HR field.
• Planning skill, Communication skill, Manpower management.
• Understanding organizational behavior.
• Cheerful, self-confidence, decisive, team player, open-minded, fairness, dedicated, positive attitude, honest.
• Good coordinator and Persuasive.
• Able to keep things confidential.
• Able to work under pressure.
• Computer literacy (pivot, V-look up, PowerPoint design etc.).
• Strong presentation and report-writing skills in English and Khmer

Job Description:
• Provide timely and relevant reports to management to monitor accurate stock status.
• Maintain records of daily stock, daily workers, schedule tasks and ensures tasks are completed as planned.
• Manage work schedule of Stock Keeper and handle their work to ensure the stock were delivery to our outlet.
• Prepare and reconcile daily stock issue reports, promotion reports, closing stock reports submits to management.
• Do stock record of warehouse and each outlet.
• Training stock keeper’s staffs about our ingredient’s type and how to drive Tuk Tuk.
• Delivery supplies and equipment to outlets by receiving and transferring items.
• Check and verify claims of stock from various promotion activities submitted by operation Department, ensure correct supporting documents are provided and challenge inappropriate claims.
• Solve all stock related problems.
• Performing other tasks as required.
• Report dangers, health and safety issues within the warehouse and maintain a record as well actions taken.
• Report stock in warehouse to management and manage stock order.
• Review weekly and monthly physical stock count and review weekly expired stock usage.
• Manage stock keeping procedures/row management to enable the use FIFO inventory management, regularly check the stock to ensure damaged stock is well managed,
communicated and provided for provision.
• Control stock use of all outlets.
• Prepare cleaning schedule for Warehouses, Motor delivery, stock and carries out checks to ensure highest standards of cleanliness.
• Other Ad-Hoc duties and tasks assigned by the Management of the Company.
Job Requirement:
• Male only, Age from 23 to 35
• Have experience minimum 1 to 3 years of relevant warehouse and distribution operation work experience.
• Should be able to operate and take care of warehouse equipment well.
• Must have good problem-solving skills and leadership quality.
• Must have good interpersonal and communication skills.
• Decision making & problem-solving skills.
• Good interpersonal & people management skills.

job title: Sales Manager / Sales Supervisor / Sale Officer
position: Sales Manager / Sales Supervisor / Sale Officer
Job Description:
**  Sale Showroom Supervisor
* Duties:
- Supervise end user sale performance.
- Make daily, weekly and monthly sales report.
- Manage sale staffs and stocks.
- Assist walk in customers with product information.
- Keep and maintain good relationship with customers.
- Deal with potential customer for promotion and selling product(s) and Service(s).
- Update all sales activities, potential customer profile and collect customer’s profile.
- Search and make schedule to meet up with customers (If in need)
- Exhibits high level of commitment to customer satisfaction.
- Assist operation and sale duty.
- Be able to flexible with the time schedule.
- Make plan to increase sales revenue and expand to new customers, reports to Supervisor/Manager.
- Sale Performance report.
- Any others task or responsibility can be assigned by Sale Manager/brand manager.

** Senior Sale Showroom Staff
* Duties:
- Engage in end user sales process by dealing with customer.
- Manage customer data and stock.
- Make daily, weekly and monthly sales report.
- Assist walk in customers with product information.
- Keep and maintain good relationship with customers.
- Deal with potential customer for promotion and selling product(s) and Service(s).
- Update all sales activities, potential customer profile and collect customer’s profile.
- Search and make schedule to meet up with customers (If in need).
- Exhibits high level of commitment to customer satisfaction.
- Assist operation and sale duty.
- Be able to flexible with the time schedule.
- Make plan to increase sales revenue and expand to new customers, reports to Supervisor/Manager.
- Sale Performance report.
- Any others task or responsibility can be assigned by Sale Supervisor/Sale Manager.
Job Requirement:
** Sale Showroom Supervisor
* Requirements:

Job Description: 1. Planning, Identification and Review o Be a though partner to the HRBP’s to identify learning needs in accordance with the company’s strategies and business operation plans. o Develop and effectively communicate a learning strategy for the company and effectively communicate a learning strategy an provide an annual learning plan that supports this strategy. o Do budgeting to secure both outdoor and indoor learning to meet the ongoing capacity development needs of the company. o Monitor and evaluate the learning effectiveness through feedback and evaluation following the session to continuously improve learning effectiveness. o Organize past and current learning materials into a central library resource (SharePoint) for the HRBP’s and other management team members to use.2. Succession Planning  o Work closely with the HRBP Managers to develop the succession planning to ensure that the company has new leaders who can replace old leaders when they leave or retire.o Ensure that the identified high performance and potential employees get trainings to develop new skills and refine existing ones. o If no identified internal employees for the replacement of old leaders when they leave or retire, work closely with the talent acquisition manager on the hiring plan of the external applicants. o Do trail run of the succession planning if any leaders on the long leave, maternity leave…etc. 3. Employee Engagement o Lead the administration of employee engagement survey for the entire organizationo Design engagement calendar (fun-at-work, festival celebrations…etc)o Lead the implementation of engagement calendar and other actions as per engagement surveyo Drive understanding of the purpose of the engagement survey with employeeso Partner with the HRBP managers to strengthen understanding of survey reports and analysis 4. Training Budget Preparation o Ensure that budget of learning & development both indoor and outdoor is prepared based on the company’s L&D plano Deal with the externa L&D agencies to get the best prices of trainingso Regularly review the L&D budget to ensure that the budget is in place for the L&D5. H&S / EHS:o Lead by example and actively support EHS activities within your area and be accountable for EHS awareness and performance under your area of responsible. o Ensure to be complied to the Group and local EHS policies and standard. o Ensure adequate risk assessments are carried out which, involving employees and contractors, during the development of the safe work procedures for the activities to be performed under your scope.o Ensure all personnel under your control are adequately trained about the risk associated with their jobs. o Ensure the third-party temporary labour worker working under your area are adequately trained and to be complied for the site EHS rules.o Ensure adequate PPE is available for employee and contractors working under your areao Ensure that periodic inspections are conducted to identify EHS concerns and action plans has been developed and implemented to eliminate EHS issues from its source. o Ensure employee and contractors under their supervision have at least one personnel performance priorities are related to EHS activity or topic.

** How to apply:
1. Please send your Cover Letter, CV with 4x6 Current Photo to us by email hr@mjqeducation.edu.kh, and only short-list candidates will be notified.
2. Please always put your email subject as “Application for…………. (Position you applied)’’, and rename as your attached file in your full name, e.g. CV_Name. 
3. Please put all your attached documents into one file as combining as PDF file only.
Address: #11A, St. 402, Sangkat Tumnup Teuk, Khan Boeung Keng Kang, Phnom Penh.

Company Profile:
Mengly J. Quach Education (MJQE) is known as a unique education system for its superior quality, discipline and services. It is remarkably consistent with the use creative, innovative, and critical thinking to make a difference for our young generations. We are always optimistic that our standard system will surly provide the best education for our kids and help shape their life to act with respect towards themselves.

MJQE is in a restructuring period of change. MJQE focuses its efforts to ensure all students have the academic and personal skills required to succeed in college and life. Currently, MJQE is one of the 4 companies in the MJQ Group (MJQ Education, Prasethpheap Finance, MJQ Travel and the Mengly J. Quach Media Network (MMN)). MJQ Education has 4 school-companies (Aii Language Center (Aii), American Intercon School (AIS), Go Overseas Study Overseas (SOGO) and i-Learn). There are 7 campuses of Aii and 8 campuses of AIS throughout Cambodia serving more than 17,000 students with more than 500,000 alumni since 2005. 

The MJQE is committed to building talented and committed students and providing the appropriate supports to schools to ensure all students can be successful.

MJQE is an Equal Opportunity Employer. MJQE ensures equal employment opportunities regardless of race, creed, sex, color, national origin, religion, age, sexual orientation, disability, citizenship status, political affiliation, marital status or other human differences. MJQE has a policy of active recruitment of qualified minority employees.
Our Benefits:
Competitive salary 
- Scholarship for employee, employee's children, and spouse 
- NSSF and 24 - hour worldwide accident insurance 
- Maternity, paternity, and marriage benefits
- Benefits as compliance to Prakas of Ministry of Labor and Vocational Training 
- Career advancement opportunities 
- Training opportunities for professional development 
- Annual salary increment based on experience and performance review.

Job Description:
S&OP:
• Basic understanding of key business metrics: EBIT, GPaL margin, Market Share
• Grasps cross functional drivers (T-Shaped)
• Able to act as guardian and execute the minimum mandatory standards of the Carlsberg S&OP
• Collaboration with Supply Planning, Sales, Marketing, Finance functions
Demand Planning:
• Good understanding of Statistics.
• Experienced analyst of historical data
• Working with available tools (Excel).
• Understands each of the building blocks of the total Forecast.
• Securing an effective consensus and collaborative approach for the final forecast
• Able to calculate Planning KPIs (Forecast Accuracy and Bias, and service KPIs) and knows the levers driving the improvements.
• Provides demand data formatted into appropriate reports and feeds them to other functions in time
Supply Planning:
• Very detailed knowledge of distribution requirement planning, master production scheduling, Familiar with Foundations of Supply Planning areas and how these impact overall Business
• Understands output/information of Supply Planning process
• Understands the Weekly Supply Planning cycle and right sequence of Supply Planning Activities
• Basic understanding of customer service and inventory KPIs/NPD and Portfolio Management:
• Basic understanding of the standardized Portfolio Management processes within Carlsberg Group.
Job Requirement:
• Bachelor degree and preferred APICS CPIM certified   
• Minimum of 5-7 years supply planning experience/ 2-3 years’ managerial experience 
• Proficient English in spoken and written
• Proficient in MS Office, experience with Navision ERP a plus
• High integrity & positive work ethics
• Good communication & negotiation skills
• Team player/Continuous learning
• Self-motivated and has desire to add value and improve

Job Description:
• Train customers in outlet training module for Cold drink customers (pouring perfect training, troubleshooting etc.)
• Performing and using the procedures on installation, sanitation, and trouble shooting.
• Report to TSM when ST has to go to outlets and travel for the service of outlet complain and after his return from visit.
• Need to follow the detail instructions by CDM/TSMs  
1) Cold drink system installation and best Practices, 
2) Fault Finding trouble shooting 
3) Sanitation service by routine.
4) Service and maintenance in outlet/store
- At sanitation time and in store, cleaning of Cold Drink equipment in a hygienic way
- Cleaning all the elements of the counters, drip tray, side panels of cooler and pythons in a mild soap solution, then drying everything with a clean cloth. This also includes ensuring that the cooler has full ventilation capacity and the condenser is not full of dust. Likewise for post mix equipment.
• Cleaning and polishing of equipment upon return from outlet or event.  
• To achieve a quality and efficiency KPI model for the Technicians
 by Manager.

• Engineering degree
• Fair in English Language 
• +2 years relevant technical experience, ideally in FMCG/beer environment, Two years above  / Driving License
• Effective, positive and energetic attitude 
• Team-orientation and ability to implement the team work
• Ability to communicate clearly - Decent presentations skills 
• Team-orientation and ability to implement the team work
• Action-oriented, persistent and result oriented
• Solid organizing skills

Job Description:
Responsibilities:
● Produce well-researched content for publication online and in print
● Organize writing schedules to complete drafts of content or finished projects within deadlines
● Utilize industry best practices and familiarity with the organization's mission to inspire ideas and content
● Communicate and cooperate with a writing team, including a content manager, editors, and web publishers
● Follow an editorial calendar, collaborating with other members of the content production team to ensure timely delivery of materials
● Develop related content for multiple platforms, such as websites, email marketing, product descriptions, videos, and blogs
● Monitor and analyze the performance of key performance indicators (KPIs) to offer suggestions for improvement
● Use search engine optimization (SEO) strategies in writing to maximize the online visibility of a website in search results
Job Requirement:
Qualifications:
● Proven record of excellent writing demonstrated in a professional portfolio
● An impeccable grasp of the English language, including idioms and current trends in slang and expressions
● Ability to work independently with little or no daily supervision
● Strong interpersonal skills and willingness to communicate with clients, colleagues, and management
● Ability to work on multiple projects with different objectives simultaneously
● Strict adherence to the style guides of each company and their policies for publication
● Good time management skills, including prioritizing, scheduling, and adapting as necessary
● Proficiency with computers, especially writing programs, such as Google Docs and Microsoft Word, Excel, Outlook, and PowerPoint
● Familiarity with each client's requirements and the company's brand image, products, and services
Company Profile:
Cambodian Derivatives Exchange ("CDX") is recognized by the Ministry of Economy and Finance of Cambodia and Securities and Exchange Commission of Cambodia. CDX is dedicated to facilitate derivative broker in effective and efficient order execution and clearing, provide fair, open and transparent trading system to investors and contribute progressively to the Cambodia derivatives market, leading the global financial market.

CDX is a true leader, leading the way forward in a fast growing emerging market, transforming the path towards a regulated standard for a diverse global experience.

CDX continues to progressively enrich the quality of education and services through solutions and technology surrounding the Cambodia financial markets. Specifically, the physical and electronic trading of precious metals, foreign currencies and derivative products. This will allow investors to diversify investment choices that will assist in wealth creation and protection.

Job Description:
1. បង្កើតផែនការយុទ្ឋសាស្រ្ត ផែនការសកម្មភាព  គោលដៅផ្នែក និង បទបញ្ជាផ្ទែក្នុង និងផែនការថវិការសំរាប់ផ្នែកធនធានមនុស្ស និងរដ្ឋបាលដើម្បីជ្រោមជ្រែងអោយ ក្រុមហ៊ុនទាំងមូលសំរេចគោលដៅ
2. បង្កើតគោលនយោបាយ នីតិវិធិការងារនានា ទំរង់នានាដើម្បីជ្រោមជ្រែងអោយក្រុមហ៊ុនទាំងមូលសំរេចគោលដៅ
3. តាមដានការអនុវត្ត គោលនយោបាយ នីតិវិធិការងារ ផែនការផ្សេងៗដើម្បីធានាភាព អនុលោម
4. ផ្តល់ការនែនាំ និងជ្រោមជ្រែងប្រចាំថ្ងៃដើម្បីធានាថាបុគ្គលិកក្រោមបង្គាប់ធ្វើការអស់សក្តានុពល និងសំរេចលទ្ឋផលដែររំពឹងទុក
5. ចូលរួមដឹកនាំបង្កើត និងកែរសំរួលទំរង់នៃកិច្ចសន្យាការងារសំរាប់បុគ្គលិក 
6. ចូលរួមដឹកនាំបង្កើតនិងកែរសំរួលទំរង់នៃតារាងពិពណ៌នាការងារសំរាប់ក្រុមហ៊ុនទាំងមូល និងបង្កើតតារាងពិពណ៌នាការងារសំរាប់ផ្នែកធនធានមនុស្ស និងរដ្ឋបាល
7. ចូលរួមក្នុងផែនការយុទ្ឋសាស្រ្តការជ្រើសរើសបុគ្គលិកដើម្បីសំរេចភាពទាន់ពេល និងមានតម្លាភាព
8. ដឹកនាំ និងចូលរួមបង្កើតអោយមានផែនការបណ្តុះបណ្តាល និងផែនការអភិវឌ្ឍ បុគ្គលិកសំរាប់ក្រុមហ៊ុនទាំងមូលដើម្បីធានាថាបុគ្គលិកបានទទួលការបណ្តុះបណ្តាល និងអភិវឌ្ឍអោយគាត់រីកធំធាត់នៅក្នុងអាជីពការងាររបស់គាត់
9. ផ្តល់ការប្រឹក្សាតាមផ្នែកនីមួយៗ និងបុគ្គលិកគ្រប់គ្រងទាក់ទងនឹងបញ្ហាបុគ្គលិកដើម្បីធ្វើអោយបរិយាកាសការងារកាន់តែប្រសើរទ្បើង
10. ចូលរួមផ្តួចផ្តើមក្នុងការបង្កើត និងកែរតំរូវគោលនយោបាយប្រាក់រង្វាន់ដើម្បីធានាថា គោលការណ៍នេះអាចប្រើប្រាស់បានប្រកបដោយប្រសិទ្ឋភាព
11. ជំរុញទៅលើការអនុវត្តវប្បធម៌ក្រុមហ៊ុនជាប្រចាំ

ការទទួលខុសត្រូវៈ
1.ប្រសិទ្ឋភាព និងតម្លាភាពនៃគោលនយោបាយធនធានមនុស្ស បទបញ្ជាផ្ទៃក្នុង វប្បធម៌ក្រុមហ៊ុន នីតិវិធីការងារ និងទំរង់លិខិតផ្សេងៗ
2. ប្រសិទ្ឋភាព និងតម្លាភាពនៃការជ្រើសរើសបុគ្គលិក ទ្បើងឋានៈ បញ្ឈប់កិច្ចសន្យាការងារ ផ្ទេរការងារ និងការវាយតំលៃលទ្ឋផលការងារបុគ្គលិក
3.ប្រសិទ្ឋភាពនៃគោលនយោបាយ និងនីតិវិធិការងារផែនការបណ្តុះបណ្តាល និងការអភិវឌ្ឍន៍សម្តត្ថភាពបុគ្គលិក
4.សំរេចបាននូវគោលដៅផ្នែកធនធានមនុស្ស និងរដ្ឋបាល និងផែនការថវិការ
5.ក្រុមហ៊ុនទទួលបាននូវបរិយាកាសល្អ ដោយយ៉ាងតិចមានបុគ្គលិក៨០%ពេញចិត្ត
6.ចៀសវាងអោយបាននូវហានភ័យដែរបានដឹងមុនសំរាប់បុគ្គលិកទាំងអស់
7.ប្រសិទ្ឋភាពនៃលទ្ឋផលរំពឹងទុករបស់បុគ្គលិកក្រោមបង្គាប់
8.ប្រសិទ្ឋភាព និងភាពរលូននៃកិច្ចការងាររដ្ឋបាល

Job Description:
- Handle all clearing entries of DB Schenker receivables. Ensure correct accounting entries are being made and numbers are reflecting actual status.
- Responsible for DB Schenker collection and ensure that physical amount tally with General Ledger balance.
- Handle Petty Cash. Ensure petty cash request form and approvals are in place properly as per authority matrix. Reimbursement need to be done timely to cover business requirement and ensure GLs are correctly posted. Cash count, a crucial factor in petty cash process, need to be filed with accurate documentation, amount, and acknowledged by manager in charge.
- Ensure that there are proper control systems in DB Schenker Cambodia and no fraud due to poor control environment of cash and bank transactions. Work toward to ensure that no 'A' is received during the internal audit, no 'NO' answer is received during procedural audit and no Management letter during external audit
- Ensure that all reports meet deadlines and expected quality. To make sure all statutory filings are made on time. Check and make sure daily transaction in complying with local taxes, accounting rules, regulations and standards as well as Global policies are met
- Other assignments and projects assigned by Chief Finance Officer/Finance Controller.
Job Requirement:
-	Bachelor’s degree in any field and fresh graduate also encourage to apply
-	Good computer literacy: MS. Word, Excel (Advanced level is preferable), Outlook/Email, Internet
-	Good command of English in both verbal and writing communication; Knowledge of Mandarin Chinese is an advantage
-	Good interpersonal skills and ability to engage with team and manage the workload
-	Self-management and sound knowledge of being a highly responsible
-	Understand the sense of urgency; commit to deadline and 100% compliance
-	Have attention to details
Company Profile: DB Schenker is the world's leading global logistics provider - we support industry and trade in the global exchange of goods through land transport, worldwide air and ocean freight, contract logistics and supply chain management. Integrated logistics resides at the world's most important intersections, where the flow of goods creates an effective link between carriers. Our value-added services ensure the flow of goods continues seamlessly and supply chains stay lean and optimized for success. Our business holds top positions in automotive, technology, consumer goods, trade fair logistics, special transports, and special events logistics. DB Schenker group has more than 76,000 employees worldwide in 2000 locations around the world.Working Schedule:Monday to Friday: 8:00am to 5:30pm (Lunch Break an hour)2 Saturday (Half): 8:00am to 12:00pm

Job Description: • Responsible to lead the automation inclusive maintenance ( internal or external), upgrades hardware or software on services and license• Responsible for work order(WO) scoping, prioritization, quality of work order detail, issuing of work orders, and the effective follow up and closing out of work orders. • Plan, control, and monitor plant control & instrumentation maintenance activities through work order system. • Ensure that the instruments comply with health and safety regulations. • Participant in plant safety, health and environmental, TPM programs. • Reporting Near miss and unsafe condition.• Implement procedure, SOP & WI.• To understand and apply LOTO for during work.   • Ensure production equipment are in the good condition to run smooth process and production. • Provide and conduct daily & weekly performance evaluation and provide plan for improvement by RCA or advanced problem solving. • Continuous improvement on technical availability through TPM analyses the breakdown in daily basic.• Install, maintain, repair, overhaul, calibration and test a Brewery equipment & instrumentation. • Troubleshoot all machines and process controller hardware, maintain a functional knowledge if the operation of the system software and hardware.• Make periodic preventative maintenance inspections of all machine and control systems. Diagnosing existing or potential trouble.• Read and interpret wiring diagrams, drawings, and specifications in making installations or performing major repair work. • To work with Area responsible for troubleshooting any automation related breakdown. • To work with team for achieve maintenance KPI.
Job Requirement: • Bachelor/ Engineering degree in automation, process engineering, software engineering or relevant areas.• Knowledge of electrical standards, production networks, protocols. Knowledge/ practical experience with PCS ( Proleit) and  PLC/Scada ( Siemens)• Driving for results• Analytical thinking• Cross team interacting and communication with impact• Empowering people

Job Description:
Main Responsibilities
•	Business Development
•	Procurement and Carrier Performance Management
•	Margin Management (Pricing guidance)
•	Market Intelligence
•	Rate administration

Main Tasks
Procurement/ Business Development
•	Support RFQ/Sale pricing 
•	Ensure highly competitive local charges
•	In alignment with region benchmark central procurement vs. local procurement opportunities for the best results
•	Establish excellent working relationship with carriers on local level as well as local players
•	Execute and cascade DB Schenker Global preferred Ocean Carrier strategy within assigned country/Branch,
Margin Management
•	Price FCL rates for all kinds of FCL Ocean Freight business opportunities (focus on
country/local opportunities), and support local commercial teams to achieve best procurement results, as well as Pricing Guidance to achieve profitable growth (end-to-end basis)
•	Support and promote Pricing Models 
•	Manage and balance Margin Optimization vs. Aggressive Growth
•	Administer buying rates (local charges, local rates upon request)with easy access to authorized group
Carrier Performance Management
•	Manage Carrier quality KPI’s and provide input on deviations, eg data accuracy, invoice quality, in time availability of information etc.
•	Building strategic carrier relationship.
•	Organize and lead in carrier quarter business review (QBR) to review business progress with all main stakeholders.
•	Building strategic carrier relationship.
•	Manage allocation, steer carrier choices both procured & internal allocation. 
•	Ensure weekly allocation fulfilment.
•	Manage master Customer Matrix List & create visibility to network.

Budget
•	Monitoring and controlling of FCL volume performance.
•	Support trade strategy through steering of volume & allocation management. 
•	Assist origin clusters in defined space escalation process.
•	Monitor customer performance in line with award.
•	Ensure NAC commitment towards nominated carrier(s).

Market Intelligence 
•	Inform Region and share local Ocean Freight FCL market analysis in close cooperation with country/branch and local Ocean solutions
•	Provide regular Market Reports to country
•	Inform Countries Branches about latest development
•	Identify weak spots of competition
Job Requirement:
• Bachelor’s Degree in Business Studies/ Sales & Marketing/ Foreign Trade /Economics or equivalent
• Minimum 5 years experience in freight forwarding/logistics industry is required with Minimum 2 in related role of pricing/carrier management/trade management
• Thorough understanding of both FCL and LCL business 
• Good communication skill, efficiency in time management, high accuracy and patience and problem-solving skill
• Good command of English
• Good computer skills (Word, Excel, PowerPoint, etc.)
• Positive and convincing attitude, motivated and eager to gain business.
• Self-management (Planning, Organizing & Goal Setting, Execution)

Job Description: EHS - Always work with 5 lifesaving rules  - Understand and apply process flow for working heights, hot work, confined space permit during work- Basic environmental and chemical safety handling - Member for LOTO activities and involves other safety activities- Report any near miss and safety concern (personal KPI)- Weekly LTA sharing with staffs and follow safety culture Utility  - Ensure ownership and responsible for plant utility equipment example power generator, process cooling plant, boiler, compressed air, CO2 recovery plant and wastewater plant - Understand Utility KPI example Water, Energy, Electricity and CO2 cost within agreed target- Follow utility COM on daily work operational with effective way- Record and review daily operational parameter, consumption of chemical and efficiency of plant- Engagement & support in any production line issues- Execute daily task from line responsible - Execute PM work order - Attend any daily, weekly, or monthly utility meeting if required- Attend utility PMS meeting and escalate any operational or maintenance issue if required - Discuss with line responsible for manpower planning- Involvement in overhaul plan activities - Follow up with shift-based operator for any machine issues- Management of maintenance data included PM, CM, BM and TBM- Follow work instruction (WI) within WO/SOP- Ensure spare parts cost allocation fully utilized- Ensure that WO completion within time frame- Attend any troubleshooting or emergency breakdown even off shift - Proper maintain of all equipment documents included technical manual, electrical drawing and spare part- Spare part planning and review any critical part with storekeeper- Communicate with contractor and 3P maintenance providersQuality- Understanding HACCP process and food safety risk- Practice GMP - Apply toolbox hygiene standards and workshop area cleanliness - Support QC for quality activities Reporting- Ensure utility reports are proper record- Ensure accurate calculation of utility KPIs- Ensures work order completion and accurate of information- Ensures CM & BM are updates with WO system- Raise any part broken and defective to line responsibleImprovement and problem Solving - Ensures ideas improvement are captures following job completion - Reviews improvement ideas with maintenance teamIncorporated new ideas into work instruction- Participating in various maintenance improvement project based on Lean TPM- Drive the implementation of Lead TPM activities example 5S, PMS and problem solving, Gemba Kaizen - Support operator and maintenance for AM and PM activitiesH&S / EHS:- Cooperate with leader to assist them in achieving their respective targets and objectives related to EHS. - Follow all procedures and work instructions which EHS related, and if the procedures and work instructions are unclear, get assistance/advice from the direct reporting immediately.- Report any accidents or unsafe conditions/behaviours to their direct reporting; suggest ways of improving work methods and/or eliminating hazards at the source to reduce risk. - Show care and concern of fellow co-workers in your workplace in terms of EHS.
Job Requirement: - Technical diploma- 1-3 years’ experience within a manufacturing/ maintenance environment.- Experience of operate and maintenance of utility plant equipment- Driving for results - Analytical thinking - Cross team interacting

Job Description: • Ensure commercial systems (DMS/SFA, Na vision) day-to-day operation are working smoothly.• Enhance systems per the requirements provided by Sales Operation department and monitor the process.• Develop the detailed planning and delivery of the project including control of budget, timeline, scope, and quality • Ensure all documents are up to date such as training materials, contracts, inventory movement, billings, SOP, change requests, reports, ticket systems • Manage team members, their operation efficiency, as well as job delegation to ensure work is done in a timely manner• Monitor system performance in both UAT & Production environment• Vendor management (DMS/SFA, Na vision)H&S / EHS:• Lead by example and actively support EHS activities within your area and be accountable for EHS awareness and performance under your area of responsible. • Ensure to be complied to the Group and local EHS policies and standard. • Ensure adequate risk assessments are carried out which, involving employees and contractors, during the development of the safe work procedures for the activities to be performed under your scope.• Ensure all personnel under your control are adequately trained about the risk associated with their jobs. • Ensure the third-party temporary labor worker working under your area are adequately trained and to be complied for the site EHS rules.• Ensure adequate PPE is available for employee and contractors working under your area• Ensure that periodic inspections are conducted to identify EHS concerns and action plans has been developed and implemented to eliminate EHS issues from its source. • Ensure employee and contractors under their supervision have at least one personnel performance priorities are related to EHS activity or topic.
Job Requirement: • Bachelor Degree in computer / IT technology / Management or similar. • Good communication skills in English (Spoken & Written) • Qualifications in Project Management is an advantage  • Must have experience of business processes within beer / alcohol or FMCG industry• In-depth knowledge of ERP workflows and functionality is a requirement (SAP and NAV)• Knowledgeable in Microsoft .Net and SQL database is an advantage• Experience of implementing and maintaining interfaces between core ERP systems and other external system is an advantage• Experience working with front end sales tools such as IOS / Android Apps., Distributor Management Systems and Point of Selling applications is an advantage • Proactive mindset to identify issues and problems before they escalate• Must ensure understanding and acceptance from project participants to live by the GBS Operating Model ensuring the highest quality in delivery.

Company Profile:
Prudential (Cambodia) Life Assurance PLC began operations in Cambodia in January 2013. It is the leading life insurer in Cambodia with more than USD280 million assured and 27,000 policies issued (as at 31 September 2015). One of the first life insurers in Cambodia, Prudential Cambodia is committed to raising the awareness of life insurance among the Cambodian people and helping them protect and secure their financial futures.

Prudential Cambodia is part of UK-based Prudential plc. Founded in 1848, Prudential plc is an international financial services group with significant operations in Asia, the US and the UK. It serves around 25 million insurance customers and have £505 billion of assets under management (as at 30 June 2015). Prudential plc is listed on the stock exchanges in London, Hong Kong, Singapore and New York.

Prudential plc is not affiliated in any manner with Prudential Financial, Inc., a company whose principal place of business is in the United States of America.
